title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Does Not Include File Type
description: When using the SaveAs feature in the program, the file type is not included in the saved file. Additionally, the icon for the file has changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make a modification to the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon
4) A dialog window will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Provide a filename without specifying the file extension
7) Click the 'OK' button

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but the file extension is not displayed.
